name: Mark Hubbard
text:
The great folks at The Social serve up love and the best taste treats on the square in Marion AL. Check out the special brownie sundae (or is it the brownie special sundae?) - AMAZING!

These super nice folks kept the doors open a few minutes extra to let us eat in, introduce us to their wonderful family, and exchanges stories. Do not miss this!

[OK so the Shoney Boy is a personal social media thing.]

name: Starsong
text: This place sometimes gives discounts to college students. They have amazing ice cream, floats, and milkshakes. I love going here whenever I get a break. The atmosphere is usually calm and the people are very friendly.

name: Savanah Townley
text: Loved it! Great customer service, very friendly people. They have a huge variety of flavors, so there's something for everyone to enjoy. There's also board games and cards, so its a great place for friend and family game night.

name: Katie Eaves
text: Many tasty options at reasonable prices! If you haven’t been yet, you’re missing out! It’s a wonderful place.

name: Steelmanmeigs205@yahoo.com Meigs
text: Wonderful place run by wonderful folks. Great ice cream and best brownies anywhere!

name: Thomas Adams
text: Friendly service, good food and a great atmosphere

name: Jennifer B
text: Great customer service. Great-tasting icecream flavors,  especially the cotton candy! Courteous staff.

name: Riley Raynor
text: Amazing shop owner!! Great place to hang out and get some yummy ice cream! Must stop here during your visit to Marion!

name: Harley D. Snodgrass
text: The ice cream is AMAZING!!! I'm literally addicted! I love this place!!

name: Cameron Sanders
text: Gold old, down to earth vibe with the best ice cream options!!

name: Zachary Ziegenhorn
text: Best ice cream shop ever. Great atmosphere.

name: Della Maynor
text: Great place to just vhill

name: Dal Mcveay
text: Great food. Staff is super friendly

name: Anna Gonzalez
text: Delicious authentic food. Definitely can taste the culture in the food and feel the culture in the environment! Was a little over priced to be to be honest, but still delicious. Will return!

name: Fred Stringer
text: Great food! Fairly priced and delicious! I will be eating here again!

name: Dylan Hendrix
text: Love this place!! The food is excellent, the owners are friendly, and location is cozy. I had the mangú with carne fritas and it was perfect. Also recommend the fresh lime juice!

name: Joe Brasser
text: If you are looking for authentic, awesome Caribbean food this is it!

name: Dashira Alvarez
text: We order churrasco, pechuga and carne frita! Its was awesome. My kids loved the tostones. We also order a Lemonade and my husband love it. Timing was pretty fast.   Price are right. Delicious!

name: Zach Rutledge
text:
Pretty good food.  I had the Churrasco and it was quite tender and had a good chimi-churri sauce flavor.  The rice with gandules is good, too.  It's yellow rice with pigeon peas, although you can have white rice with red beans if you prefer.  The red beans are not as flavorful as the Cajun kind you're more likely to find around here, but they are good in their own right.

There's a big shareable appetizer called Con To' if you want to sample a little bit of everything.  It has Dominican salami, fried Dominican style cheese, fried pork chunks and fried chicken.  Oh, and fried plantains.  It's $12.99 but you get your money's worth.  The plantains were really good, better than I've had at other Caribbean restaurants over the years.

While the flavors you'll find here aren't as intense as Tex-Mex (or even local Mexican) restaurants, it's good enough trying a few times.  The only real issue I had was the lack of sweet tea (I am southern, after all).  They only had orange and lime juices, plus a few canned soft drinks and that was it.

name: Davika Komal-Davis (Dee)
text: Friendly home atmosphere. Food lack flavor. Beans and rice. Chicken and tostones. Worst tostones ever.

name: Alfonso Delgado
text:
Place was closed
Looks like it's out of business.

name: Allen Johnson
text: Felt at home.

name: Saira Mateo
text: A little overpriced but great food!

name: Tammy Odom
text: Stephi Cocktails & Cuisine in orange beach is a unique pairing of Asian and Caribbean fusion. We found the food to be flavorful and plenty. The atmosphere is airy and the staff is wonderful and attentive. We were greeted by a sweet young lady who promptly seated us. She introduced us to their menu and suggested a great starter. We also were impressed by management. She took the time to ask us how we were and have a light conversation with us. No drive by hello. We had the Caribbean chicken wings with a trio of sauces. The wings were so well seasoned that sauce wasn’t even needed. Then the entrees, don’t get me started on the great flavor profiles.. The Caribbean Shrimp bowl has the most tasty pineapple chutney done 2 ways… yum. The Korean Beef bowl was in a citrus herb crema that paired nicely with the coconut rice. In a nutshell take a moment stop in for lunch ( portions are generous)!

name: Kim Morris
text: We came across this wonderful spot on our beach trip and was not disappointed at all, we absolutely loved it! Kit and Kristy were amazing, everything from their friendliness to their bomb@ss cocktails, to their attention to detail, we couldn't have been happier with our experience. Also THE FOOD, insanely good. This will definitely be a regular spot for us when we visit Orange Beach. ❤

name: Tabitha Mckown
text: AMAZING food and service.  We found our new favorite place to eat at Orange Beach!  I was a little hesitant because there was no wait, but I was wrong!  This place is a hidden gem!  I had the filet and it was so tender I didn’t even use a knife.  The sushi and desserts are great, too!  Everyone at our table loved their food.  This place will not disappoint!

name: Karen Sepko
text: STEPHI WILL NOT DISAPPOINT!  The best Asian Fusion in the area!! STEPHI is in the shopping center across from Phoenix 1-4 condos in Orange Beach!  There is so much flavor in ALL the individual items on your plate.. from the marinated pickles, slightly sweet coconut rice, full flavor prime beef and perfectly blended flavored chef special sushi rolls.  The hard chocolate shell over wonderfully creamy ice cream was dreamy.. seriously.  The 2018 pendulum red blend Wine is fine... service is impeccable too!  Check Danny Reynolds came to visit the table to ensure we were happy... top service for sure!!  Oh and live music on Friday and Saturday night beginning at 8:30pm!  Try STEPHI’s .. you won’t be disappointed!!

name: Shanni Payne
text: Looking for a place with amazing food? Look no further! This place is outstanding! The food is served and looked like something out of a magazine. In fact, we saw an ad in the Islander and I immediately asked where this place was, as the food looked stunning!  The service was great as well. The manager came by and literally treated us like a good friend or family. I was shocked this place only opened a few months earlier. It will be beyond outstanding in due time. I can’t say enough about Stephi’s!

name: Nelda BRUNNER
text: Stephis was an amazing find in a little strip mall.    Drinks were exceptional, ambiance good and food was excellent!  And there was no waiting in line.  other places had 1-2 hr. wait time.  This is a diamond in the rough!  you will not be disappointed!  I would give it 5 stars!!!

name: Todd Munroe
text: My wife and I dine here quite frequently. Service can be hit or miss but it doesn't stop us from coming in. We've discovered whenever we get served by Ashley our experience is always the best. We casually mingled amongst ourselves and wondered how this place found her. She's the most competent, professional, and knowledgeable server there. Other servers aren't terrible but can tell they are newer and usually seem frazzled. The new manager is very friendly, she stopped by our table to check on us and that was the first time that's happened to us there, we loved her professionalism. This place is starting to become our new go to spot. Food is fabulous and their new cocktails are even better than before! Great restaurant!

name: Cynthia Griffin
text: We tried this restaurant on a day when we needed somewhere close by to go for lunch that would take up an hour or two. The atmosphere is relaxing and inviting. The meals were perfect portion sizes. We got the lunch menu but there are other items you can order from the dinner or full menu as we saw from other people dining in the restuarant. It was a gem to find. Well definitely be going back.

name: israel Carlisle
text: Excellent food and service. I will definitely come back. Hannah was our waitress.

name: Nelda BRUNNER
text: Stephis was an amazing find in a little strip mall.    Drinks were exceptional, ambiance good and food was excellent!  And there was no waiting in line.  other places had 1-2 hr. wait time.  This is a diamond in the rough!  you will not be disappointed!  I would give it 5 stars!!!

name: Todd Munroe
text: My wife and I dine here quite frequently. Service can be hit or miss but it doesn't stop us from coming in. We've discovered whenever we get served by Ashley our experience is always the best. We casually mingled amongst ourselves and wondered how this place found her. She's the most competent, professional, and knowledgeable server there. Other servers aren't terrible but can tell they are newer and usually seem frazzled. The new manager is very friendly, she stopped by our table to check on us and that was the first time that's happened to us there, we loved her professionalism. This place is starting to become our new go to spot. Food is fabulous and their new cocktails are even better than before! Great restaurant!

name: Deedee Thames
text: I'm giving 4 stars because the Sushi was pretty good. It is pricey, but good. The staff was friendly. I called my order in and was told it would be ready in 15 minutes. I waited a total of 48 minutes for my sushi order. I understand that they were in the process of training someone on making sushi, but 48 minutes was a bit much. We were offered 2 free sodas for our wait. That was thoughtful, but extra sushi would've been great or free sushi would've been even better!

name: Ashley S
text: Beautiful restaurant with delicious food! The steak sliders and empenadas are absolutely phenomenal! Best sushi chef in the area!

name: Jennifer Ellison
text:
This place is a jewel. Great food, great drinks,, great service.We started with empanadas and lumpia. It was excellent. Extensive cocktail list. Great wine list.
Kit and Kristi were incredible!

name: Zach Pickard
text: Waitress was friendly and fun. Food was good too. Interesting drink, tasty and very sweet. Something Something Baccoo

name: Jeff Mondick
text: Found this place while looking for cocktail bars in Orange Beach.  Great selection, super friendly staff, we will make this a regular stop.  Kit and Kristi really took care of us!

name: Quinn Sisson
text: Super cool little spot. Very pricey but I understand they are new and have to cover up front costs which can be a LOT to handle. Loved the owner coming out to the table and saying hi. Very personable guy. Will be coming back here again when I save up some fun tokens to blow.

name: Mark Kline
text: This place is amazing.  The food is unique and stellar.  So many different flavors and influences...Latin, Caribbean, Asian, and just funky.  Great drinks and staff also.  We really enjoyed the experience and the food.  And make sure to try the empanadas.

name: Leah Finlay
text: I love the cozy atmosphere and great customer service. Everything I tried were delicious! BY THE BEACH sushi was the best, I highly recommends this restaurant. We’re definitely going back!

name: Scott Gund
text: Totally unexpected meal experience.   This is NOT the place to go if your are wanting typical Gulf Shores food.   It IS the place to go if you appreciate Asian and Caribbean flavors and specialties.   Trust me on this, have the Poke bowl and be sure to include the Fresno chiles.  They are not the heat in the dish.  The Kimchi brings it.

name: israel Carlisle
text: Excellent food and service. I will definitely come back. Hannah was our waitress.

name: Natalie
text: Stephi’s is consistently AMAZING!!  We seriously ask each other in the family where we want to go OR order in from and it’s ALWAYS unanimously, Stephi’s!!! It’s consistent and the levels of flavor in each dish are extraordinary!!  The Caribbean Bowl is my fav...hands down!  Excellent food, atmosphere and service!!

name: Rita Hays
text: This restaurant is so different than the others in all the best ways. You walk into a modern yet cozy atmosphere and service is on point. The cocktails are so unique and the sushi was absolutely delicious. We will make this a regular spot to eat for sure.

name: Patrick O'Keefe
text: Wow, understated exterior, but food and cocktails great, service excellent, one of top 3 dinners during our stay, but more affordable.  Chicken Satay and Caribbean bowl a good place to start.

name: Ashley S
text: Beautiful restaurant with delicious food! The steak sliders and empenadas are absolutely phenomenal! Best sushi chef in the area!

name: Zach Pickard
text: Waitress was friendly and fun. Food was good too. Interesting drink, tasty and very sweet. Something Something Baccoo

name: Lauren Lee
text: Amazing food and drinks! All the seafood is fresh, the sushi is very delicious. Great international flavors which this area needs. Will be back!

name: Meghan Newport
text: Amazing food and service. The Caribbean Sling was one of the best cocktails I have ever had!!

name: B C
text: Fantastic Food and Drinks. This is one of the most unique places in Orange Beach. Everything is top notch. The sushi and meals are amazing, the drinks unlike anything in the area, and the atmosphere makes you feel welcome and comfortable. If you are in the area and want a unique superb experience you have to try Stephi.

name: Gage Redman
text: The food was absolutely amazing. And the staff were very nice and I definitely recommend the wings

name: Peter Traina
text: Fantastic Food....Top of the line cocktails..excellent service...live music 4 nights a week...definitely check this place out!  Sushi!

name: Jennifer Dood
text: First time in the amazing State of Alabama and had the BEST MEAL AND AMBIANCE here!!! We were part of a party of 18 and they welcomed using, fed us an AMAZING dinner and treated us to FANTASTIC MUSIC!!! Thank you 💗💗💗

resp.text: Jennifer, It was a pleasure to meet you and your family. We are so glad you enjoyed your experience. We hope to see you next time you are in town!

name: Cindy Mann
text: Amazing lunch experience!  The Chicken Satay Skewers and Cucumber Salad were delicious!  I highly recommend!

name: MargueritePerkinson
text: I’m a local. The food was great! Drinks fun and great as well. Steak was best I’ve had here. Sushi also fantastic. I’m excited!

name: Marissa Quinn
text: Worst experience I’ve had in a long time. Called ahead because 2 of us have to eat gluten free and was assured by GM Nick that most menu items were or could be made gf. He told me to make sure the wait staff knew and they’d take care of us. Waitress was not knowledgeable about gf which is fine, asked for Nick and was told he quit that day. (wait staff  looked upset/shell shocked?) Manager was HORRENDOUS and rude telling me NOTHING could be made gf including the rice!  She told me I was ‘causing a scene’ when I asked if there was anything I could eat and proceeded to blame everything on Nick. We were a party of 5 and the 3 non-gf had already ordered so asked for it to go (2 celiacs didn’t eat!). They even screwed up that order, the veggies were cold and the food (they said) was not very good.  THEN they said we didn’t show up for our reservation via Open Table so we can’t review them.  Figures.  Super disappointed.  Literally the worst restaurant experience we have had in Orange Beach.  I can only hope the owner makes some serious changes quickly.

name: Amelia Queen
text:
Manager was rude. My mother and I were eating out and we had to get gluten free food as we both have Celiac Disease. Earlier, we had called and the person on the phone told us there would be things for us to eat. We come in and order appetizers.
When we get to entrees, we learnt here is nothing to be had so we talked to the manager about it. Turns out the rice is not gluten free. THE RICE. However, the teriyaki, a sauce made with not gluten free materials, apparently was.
So we talk to the manager about this. We ask about the call earlier that confirmed we could have something, and she says the employee had walked out just hours later (I can see why) and he may have done that to deceive the company. (?!?) So we ask her what we can have and she says vegetables and seafood. We ask her to specify and she tells us to not make a scene. We were just asking her what we could eat.
I ended up crying due to how rude she was. If you can mess up rice and don’t know what’s in it, how can you be trusted to make anything else?!??!?

name: Cherry Ann St Hillier
text: We had fantastic dinner there with friends. The food is delicious and a great price. Very good service and yes we will definitely come back again.

name: Brittany Fielder
text: Amazing food and friendly staff! Definitely will be returning!

name: Cherry Ann St Hillier
text: We had fantastic dinner there with friends. The food is delicious and a great price. Very good service and yes we will definitely come back again.

name: Brittany Fielder
text: Amazing food and friendly staff! Definitely will be returning!

name: Rachel Aumueller
text: STEPHI’S!!!!!! Best restaurant on the island! Quality food (sushi, steak, burgers, chicken, etc.), live music, bar seating, kid friendly, and an overall great atmosphere!! I highly recommend that you take a visit to the Stephi restaurant!!!!!!

name: Zharren Young
text: Amazing place to dine in. Ambiance is simple yet classy and relaxing. Great place for family dinner, friends get together or simply night out to relax and have a drink. Food is amazingly tasty and affordable. Highly reccomended

name: Paige Albert
text: Wonderful food and wonderful service!! Highly recommend!

name: Danielle Doyle
text: Amazing food!!! Amazing service!!! We will definitely be back!

name: Robbie Ludlow
text: Location used to be Franco's Italian. Immediately noticed the new tenant and had to try it.  OMG... absolutely amazing food, flavors, and service. Shared the Prime Ribeye (with asparagus, smoked corn cakes, and some incredible unknown dipping sauce), a Papa Bear sushi roll (seared scallops on top...'nough said), and the Korean Beef Bowl (grilled steak, coconut rice, asian vegetables, with a teriyaki glaze) with my friend. Paired the meal with a bottle of 2018 Pendulum Red Blend Wine. Finished the meal off with the Chocolate Dome desert. Service with our waitress Ashley (highly recommended...request her) was attentive but not overbearing. If you are wanting a great place to enjoy an amazing dinner in Orange Beach, AL on your beach vacation...look no further.

name: Renee OKeefe
text: Great food! Good drinks! Highly recommend!!!

name: Alyssa Mabrey
text: Amazing food! Great servers and really good live music!

name: Levis Lee
text: What a joke ! 54 dollars for sashimi....nothing there ! Owner too busy talking about how much money his liqueur cost then to care about customers having to go to rouses to use the restroom . Good luck 👍

name: Susan Powrie
text: A welcome addition to the area with a diverse menu and attractive decor.  I ordered the Spicy Thai Pork Noodle Bowl--which was FABULOUS, even though we were not permitted to sub out the kimchi for additional soba noodles.  Those noodles are craveworthy, and I'd love to see them as a standalone menu item!  My husband had the Pinchos de Pollo--which was also very good, but an extremely small portion for the money.  He was offered a drink or dessert to compensate for the lack of dinner (which we appreciated), but another skewer of chicken or a vegetable would have been far better.

name: Ricky Cook
text: Great place to eat had a Great time.

name: Dawson Gribble
text: Great food and awesome drinks! Service is amazing!

name: Riley Sieron
text: horrible sushi everyone i was with threw up after.

name: Dequan Bey
text: Great food amazing service

name: Aaron Hudgins
text: Great atmosphere and better service!

name: Joshua Kesling
text: FANTASTIC!!!! Chef is ON POINT!!!!

name: Gail McDorman
text: Awesome food and atmosphere 👍

name: Rick Naqvi
text: Seriously overpriced for what it was.

name: Mia Roberts
text: Unkind service.

name: Joshua Kesling
text: FANTASTIC!!!! Chef is ON POINT!!!!
